p: To explore the volume of studies on emerging viruses, we examined the publication of papers about infectious diseases. First, we defined several notions that we used to define publication and citation rates. Let D be a set of disease names and P a set of papers. Namely, for a paper p ∈ P, p Disease is defined as the disease that matches the paper’s keywords, p Year as the paper’s publication year, and p citations as the set of papers citing p.
